name: ClimateCONF 2K18
content: BioLEAGUES Worldwide takes immense pleasure to extend our warm welcome to invite all the participants around the Globe to attend ClimateCONF 2k18 which is going to be held at Bali, Indonesia on August 30th - 31st, 2018 which will entail keynote presentations, Oral talks, Poster presentations and workshops based on essential topics.
